title: Mad lib font
content:
I'm hoping this is an easy one for yall....

I'm going crazy trying to figure out which font is used in the traditional mad libs books. Not the words underneath the blanks (verb, adjective, etc.), but the font used in the "story" itself. Please help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312164904im_/http:/typophile.com/files/spookymadlib_4341.jpg)
author: cetrulia

comments.content: It’s really small, but I think it’s [ITC Garamond](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312164904/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/garamond/).
